address: 60 Dao Duy Anh, Ward 9, Phu Nhuan District, HCM City
slogan: YOUR BELIEF IS OUR DRIVING FORCE FOR DEVELOPMENT
companyName: M.A.I Development And Advertising Company Limited
establishment: was established and started operations in 2015.
aboutUsContent1: With nearly 10 years of experience in advertising, printing, and packaging production, along with
aboutUsContent2: a dynamic, passionate, dedicated, and experienced team.
aboutUsContent3: We always aim to follow the slogan
aboutUsContent4: we strive to be a trusted partner for our valued customers and partners
ourProductsContent1: Instead of using non-biodegradable plastic bags that contribute to global pollution, consumers today are increasingly shifting to paper bags, which help protect the living environment.
ourProductsContent2: A standout product that captures customers' attention at first sight is not necessarily due to its functionality but rather its external appearance. Paying attention to packaging design is essential for every product.
designAndProductionPagerPacking: Design and production of paper packaging
posmContent2: a place that connects brands with customers through unique and effective advertising strategies. We are proud to be your strategic partner in delivering your message to the target audience in a creative and sophisticated manner.
designAndContributeTitle: Design and Construction of Billboards and Advertising Light Boxes
designAndContributeContent: where you can turn your ideas into reality with advanced digital printing technology. We are your trusted partner in creating high-quality printed products with unlimited precision and creativity.
connectWithUsContent1: If you would like to place an order with special requests, share feedback, send a message, or simply share a spontaneous thought with us, please don’t hesitate.
connectWithUsContent2: All your messages are very valuable to us. In return, we will strive to respond as quickly as possible because there is nothing worse than making our customers wait too long.
productAndServeForCustomer: Products and Services That Customers Are Interested In
lapdatContent1: Showroom furniture: cabinets, product display shelves. Trade show booths, event booths, P.O.S.M (Point of Sale Materials):
lapdatContent2: Poster: conveys content through images, drawings, messages, and detailed text, often printed on paper and affixed to walls or vertical surfaces. Posters are designed to attract viewers from a close distance due to their size and small font. In terms of durability, these posters are typically used for advertising signs and display boards
lapdatContent3: X-standee, roll-up standee: commonly appear in exhibitions, seminars, and trade fairs. They are popular due to their portability, the ability to fold up when not in use, and particularly low printing costs if the content needs to be changed.
lapdatContent4: Danglers: are advertising signs suspended from the ceiling, commonly found in supermarkets or retail stores.
lapdatContent5: Sticker/ Decal is a type of decal used to stick on various surfaces chosen by the customer, often printed with the logo or main content of the product
lapdatContent6: Shelf talker: similar to wobbler, but shelf talker is used to install on the shelves. It allows for easy content changes by replacing the paper inside, making it a cost-effective option.
boxContent1: Billboards and light boxes are traditional forms of advertising that large businesses prioritize positioning their products in the market. Billboards are typically large advertising boards placed in high locations, such as on highways or at intersections, to attract the attention of passersby.
boxContent2: Resistant to heat, rain, sun, and harsh weather conditions, with durability and strong adhesion. To meet these conditions, we choose to print on high-quality Hiflex – a premium PVC plastic, combined with modern digital printing technology, ensuring excellent color retention and highly realistic images and colors.
boxContent3: M.A.I has a team of designers who create billboards according to customer requirements. We offer comprehensive construction and installation services nationwide. Based on the customer's actual needs, M.A.I will provide the most suitable advice.
contactContent1: With unwavering PASSION and CREATIVITY. We continuously refine ideas, projects, and solutions to deliver the best outcomes for our clients.
contactContent2: Headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, we are committed to providing professional and dedicated service to customers across the country.
